title: Ingame bug - ranked bug
body:
Happened twice now, if an enemy team surrenders (only seen on redside, ranked so far) the surrender does register if they have 4 people in game, there are 2 yesses for a surrender, then the other 2 people say yes and no at the same time the game says they surrendered but game continues.

Yes Yes [Yes No] (same time) 

[Enemy team has surrendered 3/0
Enemy team has surrendered 3/1](same time)

And the game continues, and surrender votes cant be started again


If I can ill try get a screen shot next time it happens
